#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>


using namespace std;
long long int gcd(long long int a , long long int b)
{
	long long int temp; 
	while(a % b != 0)
	{
		temp = b;
		b = a % b;
		a = temp; 
	}
	return b;
} 
long long int max(long long int a , long long int b)
{
	if(a > b)
		return a;
	return b;
}		

int main()
{

	int t; long long int n , m;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin >> n >> m;
		if(n == 1 || m == 1)
		{
			cout << max(n , m) << endl;
		}
		else
			cout <<  1 + gcd(n - 1 , m - 1) << endl; 
	}
return 0;
}
